As the door opens you rush inside the inn to find it looks like something out of a medieval fantasy with hard wood flooring, candle lighting and the customers mostly fantasy creatures. Sure there are some humans but you see elves, dwarves, goblins, trolls and fairies.

All except for the fairies tower over you like giants but you realise that they are not gaints and that you have some how been shrunk. You're so realise that the doorway probably isn't a good place for someone as small as you to be standing. Maybe you should go to one of the tables and see if you can get someone to help you but who will you go over to?
